/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. Trees line the street, adding a touch of green to the concrete jungle. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the various hues of the buildings and trees.
